Welcome to the Background Location Sample!
This sample allows you to receive location updates while using the app. \n\n In order for this feature to work, please approve access to your location via the button below.

Dev Tip: If it's important for your app's core use case to continuously receive location updates in the background, your app can receive location updates that way. 

 For this app, improve your location accuracy by receiving location updates in the background. 

 That means you don't have to keep this wonderful app open all the time to accurately receive location updates! 

 To improve the location accuracy, please choose "Allow all the time" via the button below.
To start receiving location updates, please click the button below!
